Subject: SWAROVSKI Palm Jumeirah Mall - Store opening 3rd Sep 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Thank you so much for joining the call today!

 

As discussed, SWAROVSKI PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

As a recap of today’s call, please be informed that!

 

*	@Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  to start the process of TL, Ejjari and all other govt. related documents / certificates.
*	@Raul Bautista <mailto:Raul.Bautista@3d-consultants.com>  please share all documents with GA to apply for DCD Safety Certificate.
*	@Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  All IT Equipment are installed, pending is the ADSL Line to be finalized.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Alof Joseph <mailto:Alof.Joseph@chalhoub.com>  to update all regarding the challenge of Etisalat connection by end of this week.
*	@Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com>  & @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  SR request to raise to MDM team and ensure Items are ranged and created in the system.
*	@Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com>  please to share list of few random items with Rizaldy to check and confirm if it’s reflecting correctly in the system.

Subject: SWAROVSKI Palm Jumeirah Mall - Store opening 3rd Sep 2025

 

Dear All,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

Please be informed that SWAROVSKI PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

A Microsoft meeting invitation link will be sent to all stakeholders to discuss about the opening preparations and the assigned tasks. Please ensure your attendance!

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out RSO / Alof Joseph; 055 633 5262 any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE
